User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Ubuntu; X11; Linux x86_64; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111115183813

Steps to reproduce:

Clicked "Install" on a test web app ("MARBLE RUN") purchased with one of the fake paypal accounts for test day.


Actual results:

A prompt popped up (screenshot attached) saying:

Are you sure you want to install MARBLE RUN?

  [ Install (with Native app) |v]

in the dropdown are additional choices:
  Install (without Native app)
  Not Now


There's no explanation of the difference between "with Native app" and "without Native app"; as a user I'm especially concerned in case there are security implications. Without telling what would happen, I won't allow either.



Expected results:

If the terms can't be made clearer themselves, there should be an explanation either in the dialog or linked very visibly on the page.
